description:
TVS Next enables companies to compete and grow by providing technology solutions & services and partnering with them on their IT transformation journey. We leverage emerging technologies to help companies enhance their capabilities and adapt to today's dynamic business climate.
As part of the 100-year old TVS Group, we understand the core business challenges across industries and help our customers realize new business and service opportunities and stay one step ahead of their competitors
Our experience across industries including Retail, Manufacturing, Insurance, Shipping and Logistics, Media and Publishing, Banking, Healthcare among others, translate into great functional depth and industry knowledge.
Our services include Product development, UI/ UX, Enterprise Mobility, Custom Mobile Development, Internet of Things, Wearables, Software as a Service and Analytics.
